name: Flip Fish
description:
Meet Flip, The Fish and his friends Flop, Flap and Fred.

These four awkward and clumsy fishes enjoy spreading their fins and flapping their way through the hidden caves in an attempt to avoid the protruding walls from the ceiling and the floor. Flip is certainly the leader of these fishes, and he takes the three other adrenaline junkies on their daily adventures.

Are you ready to help these 4 unique fishes achieve their ultimate stardom? Then let's go!

The game features one an easy one touch control, but can be frustrating as you try to squeeze through each of the protruding caves. Use some of the power ups (tiny mode and bubble mode) to assist you on your journey. Grab stars for the ability to continue your game without starting back at the beginning.
